name: Polar Panic
description:
Mr. Big has set his sights on the rich reserves of the Arctic, and he’s hired hunters to clear out the local wildlife. Help Polar defeat the trappers, rescue his family, and force Globoco out of his home.

Polar Panic brings classic arcade-style gaming to your PlayStation®3 with modern flair, fast paced action, and frantic 2-4 player local multiplayer matches.

50 ice-shattering single-player levels, 50 brain-freezing puzzle levels, and an everlasting Survival mode for the daring deliver endless entertainment in a small package!

Polar Panic ©2008, 2009 Eiconic Games Ltd, published by Valcon Games LLC under license.
